summary: Implements a dense block used in convolutional neural networks, assembling a series of layers that are densely connected so each layer receives the concatenated outputs of all previous layers, promoting feature reuse and efficient gradient propagation.
business_intent: Provides a reusable, configurable component for constructing DenseNet‑style architectures, enabling developers to build high‑performance deep learning models for tasks such as image classification, detection, or feature extraction.
